content.value_statement: Convex is a serverless backend platform that combines a database, serverless functions, and reactive subscriptions. This skill routes you to specialized patterns for functions, schema validation, realtime updates, AI agents, and security audits.
actual_capabilities: Routes to specialized Convex skills for functions, schema, realtime, and agents
Provides quick access to security audit and best practices patterns
Links to official Convex documentation for comprehensive guidance
Organizes Convex development into logical skill categories
limitations: This is a routing skill that delegates to other specialized skills
Does not execute Convex functions or interact with a live database
Does not generate complete Convex projects from scratch

prompt_templates.prompt: I want to build a Convex backend for my application. Start with the best practices skill to help me understand the core patterns.
prompt_templates.scenario: Initial setup and learning Convex fundamentals

prompt_templates.title: Writing Backend Logic

prompt_templates.scenario: Creating queries and mutations for user management

prompt_templates.title: Implementing Realtime Features
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a realtime subscription that updates the UI whenever new messages are added to a chat room.

prompt_templates.prompt: Review my Convex application for security issues. Run a security audit on my function implementations.

output: - Write small, focused functions that do one thing well
- Use queries for reading data, mutations for writes
- Validate all inputs using schema validators
- Avoid side effects in queries for optimal caching

best_practices: Start with /convex-best-practices to understand core patterns before building
Use /convex-schema-validator to define proper data validation upfront
Use /convex-functions for all backend logic implementation
anti_patterns: Avoid writing complex business logic directly in frontend code
Do not skip schema validation for user inputs
Avoid making synchronous API calls inside Convex queries

faq.question: What is Convex?
faq.answer: Convex is a serverless backend platform that provides a database, serverless functions, and realtime subscriptions in one unified system.

faq.question: How do I create my first Convex function?
faq.answer: Use the /convex-functions skill for patterns on writing queries, mutations, and actions for your backend logic.

faq.question: Can Convex handle realtime updates?
faq.answer: Yes. Use /convex-realtime to learn how to build subscriptions that push updates to clients automatically when data changes.

faq.question: How do I validate incoming data?
faq.answer: Use /convex-schema-validator to define validators with the Valibot library for type-safe data validation.

faq.question: Is Convex secure?
faq.answer: Convex includes built-in authentication helpers. Use /convex-security-audit to review your application for security issues.

faq.question: Can I use Convex for AI agent development?
faq.answer: Yes. Use /convex-agents to learn patterns for building AI agents with tools and function calling capabilities.
